title: So Kled...
body:
What I can gather is this champion is an amalgamation of Yosemite Sam's soul, Kentucky moonshine without dilution, and Eric Cartman's blood, riding Yoshi.

Did I miss anything else?

replies.body: Actually, his orginal inspiration was to mix Hunter S Thompson and General Patton.
So when is the Hunter S Thompson skin?
He strikes me as very similar to Don Quijote.
Yep he came up too!     Actually, before we go into preproduction  we make mood boards with dozens of references.

Could it be that his skin "Sir Kled" is a reference to Don Quijote?
I mean it fits really well with his crazy personality(also it looks like he is riding a chocobo and using the grappling hook from windwaker :D)
